${modID}:ZooeyEvent.NAME: Keeper of Balance
DESCRIPTIONS: As you attempt to get some rest in what seems to be a secure place, you awaken floating far above the clouds. NL A woman clad in armor and a blue dress, surrounded by small dragons stands before you. NL As she speaks her voice echoes in your head, as if she was speaking from all directions. NL "#b@Being@ #b@from@ #b@outside@ #b@these@ #b@skies,@ #b@I@ #b@ask@ #b@thee,@ #b@are@ #b@you@ #b@an@ #b@enemy@ #b@of@ #b@order?@"

"#b@So@ #b@be@ #b@it.@ #b@I@ #b@shall@ #b@soon@ #b@eliminate@ #b@you,@ #b@stranger@ #b@from@ #b@beyond@ #b@the@ #b@skies.@" NL The woman disappears. Then you wake up as if from a dream, a strange sense of foreboding haunting you.

The woman's expression softens. NL #bThen #bI #bshall #bhope #bthat #bthese #bskies #btreat #byou #bwell. NL The woman disappears. Then you wake up as if from a dream, a blue feather resting in your hand.

${modID}:CelesteEvent.NAME: Anchor of Celeste
DESCRIPTIONS: A former adversary appears before you, composed, but without demonstrating any overt malice. She offers to give you a pendant, for a price.
Darkstone Periapt.

${modID}:ColossusEvent.NAME: Steel of the Iron Giant
DESCRIPTIONS: A former adversary appears before you, its blade sheathed this time. Apologetic for the harm it cause you, it offers to grant you strength.

${modID}:LeviathanEvent.NAME: Dew of Leviathan
DESCRIPTIONS: A former adversary appears before you. Without a word, the serpent surrounds you with its water magic, healing your wounds. NL Then it leaves as quickly as it appeared.

${modID}:LuminieraEvent.NAME: Pride of Luminiera
DESCRIPTIONS: A former adversary appears before you, satisfied with the result of your fight. As reward for your previous victory, she offers to cleanse your curse.

${modID}:TiamatEvent.NAME: Morning Calm of Tiamat
DESCRIPTIONS: A former adversary appears before you. As you prepare to fight, she tells you to stand down and offers to free you from the chains of your past.

${modID}:YggdrasilEvent.NAME: Leaf of Yggdrasil
DESCRIPTIONS: A former adversary appears before you, though without a shred of her former aggression. Worried for you, she offers to grant you her aid.

${modID}:FireEvent.NAME: Forest Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: A sudden blue fire has ignited behind you. It feels strangely persistent in catching you despite your attempts to evade it.
You throw the first thing you manage to grab a hold of in your bag. The fire burns it to a crisp before rapidly subsiding.
You scramble to get a potion from your bag and quickly empty its contents. NL As if it were alive and aware of your intentions,
the fire retreats before you can capture any of it.
the fire enters the bottle on its own.
You hide in a small nearby cave, you barely fit, but you hope the fire will not find you here. NL
The fire passes by. You're safe. NL
Unfortunately, the fire finds you and burns you as you fail to retreat. Eventually, it subsides, and you exit the cave worse for wear. NL The outside didn't fair much better than you.
The only thing left in the fire's wake is a small dead branch.
There's nothing left in the fire's wake.
OPTIONS: [Quickly! Throw something at it!] Permanently remove a #rrandom card from your deck.

You grab the fruit and eat it. NL
~It~ ~tastes~ ~delicious.~ You feel invigorated
It tastes #r@disgusting@. You feel ill.

${modID}:RiverEvent.NAME: A Small Creek
DESCRIPTIONS: You reach a small creek. The water looks clear, and the area seems safe.

${modID}:RuinsEvent.NAME: Old Ruins
DESCRIPTIONS: Old ruins stand before you. This place appears to be what remains of some old settlement. NL There might be some useful things to find if search hard enough.

${modID}:Shrine6Event.NAME: Candles
DESCRIPTIONS: You find some peculiarly arranged candles at the entrance of a cave. Most of them are lit up.
The now lit candle illuminates some gold underneath the wax.
As you put out the candle's light, you feel relaxed. Your mind feels sharper, less clouded by distractions.
You take one of the candles for yourself. Soon after, you start feeling #yashamed for stealing it.

${modID}:Shrine10Event.NAME: Corrupted Shrine
DESCRIPTIONS: A small shrine is surrounded by a dark fog. You get shivers just by standing near it.

${modID}:Act1Entry.NAME: Sky and Stars
DESCRIPTIONS: You are floating atop a sea of clouds, and above you is a starry night sky. As you begin to process your situation, two voices echo in your head. NL @"BEING@ @FROM@ @ANOTHER@ @WORLD,@ #b@DO@ #b@YOU@ #b@SERVE@ #b@THE@ #b@STARS?@ #r@OR@ #r@DO@ #r@YOU@ #r@SERVE@ #r@THE@ #r@SKIES?"@

A pade blue-haired woman clad in white robes appears before you. NL #b"An #bobvious #bchoice" NL Despite her speaking in a much softer tone, you identify her voice as one of the two you just heard. NL #b"Even #bas #ba #bfoster #bchild, #byou #bare #bhenceforth #bmy #bchild #bstill. #bThus, #bas #byour #bnew #bgod and #bmother, #bI #bshall #bgrant #byou #ba #bblessing"

A red-skin blue-haired woman with six arms appears before you. NL #r"An #robvious #rchoice" NL Despite her without as much aggression, you identify her voice as one of the two you just heard. NL #r"Your #rinvolvement #rin #rthe #revolution #rof #rthese #rskies #rwill #rnow #rbe #raccounted #rfor. #rNow, #ras #ryour #rnew #rgod, #rI #rshall #rgrant #ryou #ra #rblessing"
#b"With #bpleasure. #bMay #bthis #bworld #bbe #bkind #bto #byou, #bmy #bchild." NL
#r"Very #rwell. #rMay #rthe #rskies #rfuther #ryour #rgrowth, #rbeing #rfrom #rbeyond #rthe #rskies." NL

You awaken if as from a dream on a field of grass, the woman is nowhere to be seen. Nevertheless, you've finally escaped that accursed Spire! NL As you look around, you realize you're standing on one of many islands, all floating over and within an endlessly vast blue sky.
